org.lenskit.results

Class ResultAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.results.ResultAccumulator

  • public abstract class ResultAccumulator
extends Object

    Accumulator for sorted lists of results. This class will return result lists, with the highest-scored result first.

    Create one with create(int).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(long item, double score)
      Add a basic result to the accumulator.
      abstract void add(Result r)
      Add a result to the accumulator.
      static ResultAccumulator create(int n)
      Create a new result accumulator.
      abstract ResultList finish()
      Finish accumulating and return the accumulated results.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ResultAccumulator create(int n)

        Create a new result accumulator.

        Parameters:
        n - The number of results desired; -1 for unlimited.
        Returns:
        A result accumulator.

      • add

        public abstract void add(@Nonnull
                         Result r)

        Add a result to the accumulator.

        Parameters:
        r - The result to add.

      • add

        public void add(long item,
                double score)

        Add a basic result to the accumulator.

        Parameters:
        item - The item ID to add.
        score - The score to add.

      • finish

        public abstract ResultList finish()

        Finish accumulating and return the accumulated results.

        When this method is called, the accumulator is reset and can be used to accumulate a fresh set of results.

        Returns:
        The accumulated results, in nonincreasing order of score.
